paragraphs.text:
%md
### Let us create a Spark dataframe from the uploaded dataset

result.msg: Let us create a Spark dataframe from the uploaded dataset

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType
schema = StructType([       
                      
  StructField("Account_Name",           StringType()),  
  StructField("First_Name",             StringType()),
  StructField("Last_Name",              StringType()),
  StructField("Title",                  StringType()),
  StructField("Type",                   StringType()),
  StructField("Details",                StringType()),
  StructField("Engagement_Minutes",     StringType()),
  StructField("Activity_Date",          StringType()),
  StructField("Id",                     StringType())
])

activities_df = sqlContext.read\
                    .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")\
                    .schema(schema)\
                    .option("header", "true")\
                    .option("delimiter", ",")\
                    .load("/tmp/activities.csv")
activities_df.show(truncate=False)
activities_df.cache()

%pyspark 
#Clean the data
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
removing_com=activities_df.select('*',regexp_replace('Account_Name','\\.com','').alias('Account_Name_com')).drop('Account_Name')
removing_inc=removing_com.select('*',regexp_replace('Account_Name_com','Inc.','').alias('Account_Name_inc')).drop('Account_Name_com')
removing_comma=removing_inc.select('*',regexp_replace('Account_Name_inc','\,','').alias('Account_Name_comma')).drop('Account_Name_inc')
removing_comma=removing_comma.withColumnRenamed('Account_Name_comma','Account_Name')
removing_comma.registerTempTable("removing_comma")
removing_comma.show(truncate=False)

%md
### Creating a dataframe of the count and percentage of most visted tutorials

result.msg: Creating a dataframe of the count and percentage of most visted tutorials

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.types import *
# Create dataframe of most frequent visited tutorials
most_frequent_tutorials=cleansed_tutorials.groupBy("Tutorial_Name1").count()
most_frequent_tutorials.registerTempTable("most_frequent_tutorials")
percentage_tutorials=sqlContext.sql("select Tutorial_Name1,count, CAST((count*100/SUM(count) over ()) AS INT) percentage from most_frequent_tutorials  order by count desc")
percentage_tutorials.show(truncate=False)
percentage_tutorials.registerTempTable("percentage_tutorials")

%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType
schema = StructType([       
                   
  StructField("Account_Name",           StringType()),  
  StructField("First_Name",             StringType()),
  StructField("Last_Name",              StringType()),
  StructField("Title",                  StringType()),
  StructField("Type",                   StringType()),
  StructField("Details",                StringType()),
  StructField("Engagement_Minutes",     StringType()),
  StructField("Activity_Date",          StringType()),
  StructField("Id",                     StringType())
])

activities_no_filter_df = sqlContext.read\
                    .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")\
                    .schema(schema)\
                    .option("header", "true")\
                    .option("delimiter", ",")\
